data.title: InforUsers S3 Community
data.meta_description: Fall MRLUG Meeting at Infor HQ on Oct. 19th, 2023
data.text:
Description

$99.00 Per Person

Less than 22 seats available Register now pay later.

Registration closes on Wednesday 12pm October 18th 2023

***Each attendee will receive an Apple Tag and phone charger!***

(Must be present to receive)

AGENDA PDF DOWNLOAD

GREAT NEWS!

Soma Somasundaram|, CTO and President of Products & Customer Success is kicking off the MLRUG event, you wonâ€™t want to miss it!

Soma Somasundaram, CTO and President of Products & Customer Success

As CTO and President of Products, Soma Somasundaram defines Infor's technology strategy and manages the design and rollout of the company's full suite of business applications. He makes sure that Infor's unique technology platform is the robust connective tissue that gives customers unmatched flexibility. As leader of customer success and enablement, Soma enjoys meeting with customers, learning their needs and pain points, then developing and incorporating solutions in our software. He guides internal teams in Support and Education to ensure customers optimize the business value of their Infor investments.

Soma has more than 40 years of experience in enterprise resource planning, supply chain, and financial applications. He also brings global business experience to Infor, having worked in many countries, including India, Germany, Australia, the UK, and the US. Soma has been with Infor from the start and has continually applied his comprehensive understanding of the IT industry to play an integral role in the growth and development of Infor.

There will be Version 10 Infor and birds of a feather sessions, as well as networking opportunites with your peers!

Plenty of Gifts, cash prizes will be raffled off at the end. $$$$$$$$$$

Welcome reception will be held at the DoubleTree Hilton on October 18th, 6pm - 8pm open bar/appetizers will be served. RSVP to DPerkins@bklynlibrary.org

Afterwork happy hour following @ 4:00 on October 19th Beer and Wine.

PLEASE NOTE: Room Blocks will be available for the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York City - Chelsea soon for the night of the 18th.

Booking Link: https://group.doubletree.com/m42m7b hotel link will expire on September 18th. SOLD OUT

If you would like to share any suggestions for this meeting, or join the MRLUG Board please let us know by placing a note in the conversations area by clicking HERE.

Assistance with registration? Contact Loring Kaveney, email: Loring.Kaveney@workoutloud.com

Vendor/session questions? Contact John Papas, email: jpapas@uft.org

Payment/Invoicing? Contact Maryellen O'Conner, email: maryellen.o'connor@archny.org

General questions? Contact Karen Sickler email: karen.sickler@oracle.com or Donnell Perkins, email: DPerkins@bklynlibrary.org

Where: Infor Headquarters

641 Avenue of the Americas

New York, NY 10011

Please Note: There are limited seats for this meeting. Also, due to security no walk in registrations will be accepted and registration will close on October 13th, 2023.
